column5: We are planning one launching from morson govt dock on Sunday . We are going to a boat in cabin in sabaskong. Has anybody had any problems leaving there trucks and trailer there. Just want to make sure our stuff is safe for a week

I haven't left my truck and trailer at the government parking lot before so I can't answer your question......But I have just down the road at Pier North. It will certainly be safe there and the charge is minimal.
We have a cabin just past there. I would feel fine leaving a vehicle there. Just take the normal precautions.
Most of the camps near Morson will allow launching and leaving vehicle for a nominal fee, most are relatively secure.. Bill
The only problem that I have had is a lack of parking spaces. If that happens just launch at a resort.
Government dock free pier north $35. One is secure one is not. I'll pay the $35. We where told no one has had a problem parking there but there's always a first.
I haven't heard of breakins this year, but they DO happen on occasion. Which ever you choose... have fun and be safe. MHO... $35 is worth supporting a local business and keeping your equipment safe!
I don't remember ever paying that much ($35) fora week's parking at a resort. Some just charge for launch, it has been a few years, though. Bill
